dcterms:creator: Sameer Pradhan
Alessandro Moschitti
Nianwen Xue
Olga Uryupina
Yuchen Zhang
dcterms:description: ONTONOTES is a large corpus for coreference resolution that includes documents in multiple languages (Arabic, Chinese, and English) and covers various genres, predominantly news. It has been a standard resource for anaphora resolution research but lacks annotations for singletons and expletives.
dcterms:title: ONTONOTES

dcterms:creator: Hong Chen
Zhenhua Fan
Hao Lu
Alan Yuille
Shu Rong
dcterms:description: PRECO is a large-scale dataset designed for preschool vocabulary coreference resolution, consisting of documents primarily from English high-school tests. It includes a significant number of singletons and follows a similar annotation scheme to ONTONOTES.
dcterms:title: PRECO

dcterms:creator: Olga Uryupina
Ron Artstein
Antonella Bristot
Federica Cavicchio
Francesca Delogu
Kepa J. Rodriguez
Massimo Poesio
dcterms:description: ARRAU is a corpus that annotates a broad range of anaphoric phenomena across various genres. It includes annotations for singletons, expletives, and split antecedent plurals, making it a rich resource for studying coreference.
dcterms:title: ARRAU

dcterms:creator: Jon Chamberlain
Massimo Poesio
Udo Kruschwitz
dcterms:description: The Phrase Detectives Corpus is a crowdsourced corpus created through a game-with-a-purpose, focusing on anaphoric judgments. It includes a rich annotation scheme and is notable for its large number of judgments per markable.
dcterms:title: Phrase Detectives Corpus

dcterms:creator: Marta Recasens
M. Antònia Martí
dcterms:description: ANCORA is a coreferentially annotated corpus for Spanish and Catalan, providing a resource for studying coreference in these languages.
dcterms:title: ANCORA

dcterms:creator: Erhard W. Hinrichs
Sandra Übler
Karin Naumann
dcterms:description: TUBA-D/Z is a dataset that provides a unified representation for various types of annotations, including morphological, syntactic, semantic, and referential.
dcterms:title: TUBA-D/Z

dcterms:creator: A. Nedoluzhko
J. Mirokvský
P. Pajas
dcterms:description: The Prague Dependency Treebank provides a coding scheme for annotating extended nominal coreference and bridging anaphora in Czech and English.
dcterms:title: Prague Dependency Treebank
